original: @64b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @64b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: dbang po nyams pa gso bar byed pa'i las kyi bye brag ni /
analyzed: dbang po nyams pa gso bar byed pa'i las kyi bye brag ni /
translated: The specific activity for healing impaired faculties is as follows.

original: dang po mig gi nad las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dang po mig gi nad las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: First, a practitioner who wishes to be freed from eye disease should observe the commitments.

original: khrus kyi cho gnas ji ltar 'byung ba'i khrus byas te /
analyzed: khrus kyi cho gnas ji ltar 'byung ba'i khrus byas te /
translated: He should perform the ritual ablution as it occurs in the source text.

original: gos gsar pa gyon pa dang smyung bar gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas khrus lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
analyzed: gos gsar pa gyon pa dang smyung bar gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas khrus lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
translated: He should wear new clothes, fast, and so on. He should perform the ablution one hundred and eight times.

original: de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la /
translated: Then, he should perform the deity yoga.

original: bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las gzungs gyi lha dpag tu med pa sgros te /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las gzungs gyi lha dpag tu med pa sgros te /
translated: From the seed syllable in his heart, he emanates countless dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ deities.

original: 'phags pa mchod la sems can gyi don bya pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus par byas nas bdag gi mig la thim pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa mchod la sems can gyi don bya pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus par byas nas bdag gi mig la thim pas /
translated: They make offerings to the ƒÅryas, perform the complete activities of the buddhas, such as benefiting sentient beings, and then dissolve into his eyes.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyan dri ma med pa thob cing yongs su dag par mkhyen pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dmigs shing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyan dri ma med pa thob cing yongs su dag par mkhyen pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dmigs shing /
translated: Having attained the stainless eye of the Buddha, and having completely perfected the knowledge of complete purity, one should visualize.

original: autpal sngon po dang skyer khanda la snying po rgyas bsdus kyi sngags ci rigs par bzlas shing byug go //
analyzed: autpal sngon po dang skyer khanda la snying po rgyas bsdus kyi sngags ci rigs par bzlas shing byug go //
translated: One should anoint with the essence of the blue lotus and the karketana flower, reciting the appropriate mantra.

original: tshag pa la ni spangs ma la bzlas shing byug go //
analyzed: tshag pa la ni spangs ma la bzlas shing byug go //
translated: For scabs, one should anoint with the mantra of the abandoned one.

original: rab rib can rnams la ni aa ru ra'i khu ba la bsngags te byug go //üîΩling thog can rnams la mtshal dang cong zhi'i khu ba la bsngags la byug go //
analyzed: rab rib can rnams la ni aa ru ra'i khu ba la bsngags te byug go // ling thog can rnams la mtshal dang cong zhi'i khu ba la bsngags la byug go //
translated: For those with cataracts, one should anoint with the juice of the arura, enchanted with the mantra.üîΩFor those with canker sores, one should anoint with the juice of lac and conch, enchanted with the mantra.

original: sha mdzor dang zug cheb rnams la ka ra dang mi'i 'o ma la bzlas la byug go //
analyzed: sha mdzor dang zug cheb rnams la ka ra dang mi'i 'o ma la bzlas la byug go //
translated: For those with boils and severe pain, one should anoint with sugar and human milk, enchanted with the mantra.

original: de ltar byas pas gdon dang nad gang yin pa yang zhi bar nges so //
analyzed: de ltar byas pas gdon dang nad gang yin pa yang zhi bar nges so //
translated: By doing so, it is certain that whatever demon or disease there is will be pacified.

original: mig gi dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga gsal ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga gsal ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The Procedure for Curing the Impaired Eye Faculty, Called The Illumination of Clarity

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes @65a * //
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes @65a * //
